description: long, heavily embroidered overall; heavy, stiff top has insets of pleat embroidery with center butterfly outlined in blue and red on metallic tape; embroidered bands in red, orange and green outline insets and entire piece; long bottom piece has large figures in blue, orange and pink embroidered on black with gold sequins overall; border on lower half has green, black and orange flora and fauna satin stitch embroidery interspersed; ties carry same motif as top; lined in blue denim
title: Baby Carrier
